asset: A luxury white gold wristwatch worth approximately $4,500, owned by {party}'s brother, is often stored in the Debtor's nightstand.
{party} regularly drives their father's 2012 Burgundy Toyota Camry LE, valued at $6,000, to commute to work.
{party}'s employer provides a company owned laptop (MacBook Pro 16-inch) with a market value of $1,425, currently used by the Debtor for remote classes.
A leased 2019 Subaru Outback worth $16,700, titled in the name of {party}'s employer, is currently parked in the Debtor's driveway.
{party} frequently wears a family heirloom necklace, currently owned by their grandmother and insured for $7,400.
The Debtor's mother keeps a personal savings account with a balance of $2,360 at the same bank used by {party}.
An antique Steinway piano appraised at $2,215 is located in {party}'s home and belongs to a neighbor who stores it there during renovations.
{party} is storing several mahogany chairs, with a total value of $820, in their basement as a favor to the owner, a close friend traveling abroad.
A Trek FX bicycle belonging to a cousin, valued at $495, is regularly used by {party} in the summer.
On weekends, {party} frequently uses a professional Canon EOS camera worth $3,300, which is property of their employer.
